mcwifipnp.gui.port.small: Input port number is to small
mcwifipnp.gui.port.large: Input port number is to large
mcwifipnp.gui.motd.info: The message display in server list
mcwifipnp.gui.OnlineMode.info: Allow offline players to join in
mcwifipnp.gui.EnablePvP.info: Allow players to kill each other
mcwifipnp.upnp.success.clipboard: Successfully get external %s. You can try to connect to it.
mcwifipnp.upnp.success.cantgetip: Couldn't get external IP! Your IPv4 may contain multiple NAT or you do not have IPv6.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.mapped: Unable to forward port %s: port was already mapped by another UPnP service, Please change port number.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.disabled: Unable to forward port %s: UPnP is not enabled on your router, You may need port mapping software.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.unknownerror: Unable to forward port %s: unknown error while adding port mapping, Please use port mapping software.
